Detailed Description

MGIgesPD508 is the class for Iges parameter data type 508(LOOP).

Member Function Documentation

void MGIgesPD508::push_back ( MGIges508Edge *  edge  )  [inline]

append an edge, which must be a newed one and whose ownership will be transfered to this.

void MGIgesPD508::write_out_into_string ( const MGIgesGSec &  gsec,
MGPvector< std::string > &  plines 
) const [virtual]

Write out this PD as MGIgesParamLine's(into plines).

Except for string data, one integer or double data is output into one MGIgesParamLine, not striding over more than one line. Only when string data is output(to Holleris string), the data may stride over more than one lines. plines[i] for 0<=i<plines.size() are valid.

Parameters:
plines Input gsec to input delimeter_param and delimeter_record;output plines.

Implements MGIgesPD.
